ci_support_linux_.yaml:
build_number_decrement:
- '0'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description: A pure Python client for the SAP HANA Database based on the SAP HANA Database SQL Command Network Protocol. pyhdb supports Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6 and also PyPy on Linux, OSX and Windows. It implements a large part of the DBAPI Specification v2.0 (PEP 249).
about.summary: SAP HANA Database Client for Python

about.description: A pure Python client for the SAP HANA Database based on the SAP HANA Database SQL Command Network Protocol. pyhdb supports Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6 and also PyPy on Linux, OSX and Windows. It implements a large part of the DBAPI Specification v2.0 (PEP 249).
about.summary: SAP HANA Database Client for Python

name: pyhdb
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyhdb" %}
{% set version = "0.3.4" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6d1064a8d7f4972e14b91b6b1742e41e1e2972b8abf75a2714000be48831c1ba

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - pyhdb
    - pyhdb.lib
    - pyhdb.protocol
    - pyhdb.protocol.constants

about:
  home: https://github.com/SAP/pyhdb
  license: Apache Software
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: SAP HANA Database Client for Python
  description: 
    A pure Python client for the SAP HANA Database based on the SAP HANA Database SQL Command Network Protocol. 
    pyhdb supports Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6 and also PyPy on Linux, OSX and Windows. 
    It implements a large part of the DBAPI Specification v2.0 (PEP 249).
  doc_url: https://github.com/SAP/PyHDB/blob/master/README.rst
  dev_url: https://github.com/SAP/pyhdb

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - danieljahn
